newsitem.title: USA: Terra Nitrogen preference units converted.
newsitem.headline: Terra Nitrogen preference units converted.

text.p: Terra Nitrogen LP said Tuesday that about 13.3 million of the 13.6 million previously issued and outstanding senior preference units have converted into common units.
The units converted on a one-for-one basis. These common units began trading Tuesday on the New York Stock Exchange under the "TNH" symbol.

Outstanding non-converting senior units will trade under the symbol "TNH.PR." As previously reported, these non-converting units will be redeemed on May 27 for $21.50 per unit exclusive of any cash distribution.
